text: Jimmy's Stars is a young-adult novel by the American writer Mary Ann Rodman. It is set in 1943 Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania against the backdrop of World War II and tells the story of eleven-year-old Ellie McKelvey, protagonist of this novel. Her older brother Jimmy, however, is drafted and she and her family struggle to keep up their hope for him. ==References== Category:2008 American novels Category:American young adult novels Category:Children's historical novels Category:Fiction set in 1943 Category:Novels set in Pittsburgh Category:Novels set during World War II Category:2008 children's books
title: Jimmy's Stars
